definition: tortoise plastron/turtle shell
tortoise/turtle
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
see 老闆|老板, boss
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: In rocky areas of Africa, some tortoises have flexible shells.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲的岩石区域内，有的旱乌龟的龟板十分灵活。

sentences.english: The article reports the identification of Plastrum Testudinis and its adulterant by ratio diagrammatic method.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了用比值图示法鉴别龟板及其混淆品。
